meanings.definition: A person who pays rates or taxes for local services.
meanings.sent1: The ratepayers in our town contribute to the upkeep of our parks.
meanings.sent2: The ratepayers attended the town hall meeting to discuss the new tax proposal.
meanings.sent3: The ratepayers were thrilled to see their tax dollars at work with the new playground equipment.
meanings.sent4: The ratepayers are the backbone of our community, supporting essential services for all.
meanings.sent5: Every ratepayer plays a vital role in maintaining our local infrastructure.

meanings.definition: The collective group of individuals who pay rates or taxes for local services.
meanings.sent1: Our neighborhood ratepayers collectively fund the street cleaning services.
meanings.sent2: The ratepayers in the city banded together to petition for better public transportation.
meanings.sent3: At the ratepayer picnic, everyone shared stories about the benefits of community contributions.
meanings.sent4: The ratepayers form a strong network of support for the development of our town.
meanings.sent5: Being a ratepayer means being part of a community that cares for its members.
